trans-unit.source: Defines a certificate used by a client to identify itself.
trans-unit.target: Definerer et sertifikat som brukes av en klient ikke identifisere seg.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the certificate to use to represent the service when communicating back to the client.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir sertifikatet som skal brukes til å representere tjenesten ved kommunikasjon tilbake til klienten.

trans-unit.source: When the first call is made on the [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] proxy, the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials> are made read-only.
trans-unit.target: Når det første kallet er gjort i den [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] proxy, den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>er skrivebeskyttet.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ClientCredentials>

trans-unit.source: Subsequently calling the `set` method results in an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.
trans-unit.target: Senere kaller den `set` metoden resulterer i en <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>.</xref:System.InvalidOperationException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"></xref> to use to represent the service when communicating back to the client.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2"> </xref> skal brukes til å representere tjenesten ved kommunikasjon tilbake til klienten.

trans-unit.source: A <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""></xref> method was used when the credential is read-only.
trans-unit.target: En <xref uid="langword_csharp_set" name="set" href=""> </xref> metoden ble brukt da legitimasjonen er skrivebeskyttet.

trans-unit.source: Allows you to specify the certificate to use to represent the service by specifying the subject distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Lar deg angi sertifikatet som skal brukes til å representere tjenesten ved å angi det unike navnet for emne.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the `subjectName` parameter, see <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.SubjectName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om den `subjectName` parameteren se <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.SubjectName%2A>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2.SubjectName%2A>

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeLocation` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default).
trans-unit.target: Verdier for `storeLocation` er inkludert i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>opplisting:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: sertifikatlageret tilordnet til den lokale maskinen (standard).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: the certificate store used by the current user.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: sertifikatlageret brukes av den gjeldende brukeren.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klientprogrammet kjører under en systemkonto, deretter er sertifikatet vanligvis i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Om klientprogrammet kjører under en brukerkonto, deretter er sertifikatet vanligvis i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeName` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdier for `storeName` er inkludert i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>

trans-unit.source: Subject distinguished name.
trans-unit.target: Unikt navn for emne.

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store the service uses to obtain the service certificate.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av sertifikatlageret tjenesten bruker til å hente service-sertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: Angir navnet på X.509 sertifikatlageret til å åpne.

trans-unit.source: Allows you to specify the certificate to use to represent the client by specifying query parameters such as storeLocation, storeName, findType and findValue.
trans-unit.target: Lar deg angi sertifikatet som skal brukes til å representere klienten ved å angi spørringsparametere eksempel storeLocation , storeName , findType og findValue .

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeLocation` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> enumeration: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: the certificate store assigned to the local machine (default).
trans-unit.target: Verdier for `storeLocation` er inkludert i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>opplisting:- <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: sertifikatlageret tilordnet til den lokale maskinen (standard).</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: the certificate store used by the current user.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>: sertifikatlageret brukes av den gjeldende brukeren.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: If the client application is running under a system account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis klientprogrammet kjører under en systemkonto, deretter er sertifikatet vanligvis i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: If the client application is running under a user account, then the certificate is typically in <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.
trans-unit.target: Om klientprogrammet kjører under en brukerkonto, deretter er sertifikatet vanligvis i <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreLocation>

trans-unit.source: Values for `storeName` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdier for `storeName` er inkludert i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.StoreName>

trans-unit.source: Values for `findType` are included in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Verdier for `findType` er inkludert i den <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType>opplisting.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType>

trans-unit.source: The most commonly used enumeration is <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType>, which does a case-insensitive search on the subject name of certificates in the specified store.
trans-unit.target: Mest brukte opplistingen er <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType>, som har et samlingstype Søk etter navn for emne sertifikater i den angitte lageret.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509FindType>

trans-unit.source: This can be an imprecise search.
trans-unit.target: Dette kan være en unøyaktig søk.

trans-unit.source: If more than one certificate is returned then the first one matching the find is used to represent the client.
trans-unit.target: Hvis mer enn returneres ett sertifikat deretter den første én samsvarende find brukes til å representere klienten.

trans-unit.source: The location of the certificate store the client uses to obtain the client certificate.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av sertifikatlageret klienten brukes til å hente klientsertifikatet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the name of the X.509 certificate store to open.
trans-unit.target: Angir navnet på X.509 sertifikatlageret til å åpne.

trans-unit.source: Defines the type of X.509 search to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Definerer typen X.509 søk kjøres.

trans-unit.source: The value to search for in the X.509 certificate store.
trans-unit.target: Verdien til å søke etter i X.509 sertifikatlageret.
